str2: A primary particle of emphasis or qualification.
A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.
Feminine of a presumed derivative apparently from the base of chasma through the idea of deficiency; a widow, literally or figuratively.
From para and echo; to hold near, i.e. Present, afford, exhibit, furnish occasion.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To give justice over, defend, avenge, vindicate. From ekdikos; to vindicate, retaliate, punish.
In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.

word: she will stop wearing me out
parse: Verb - Present Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From a compound of hupo and a derivative of optanomai; to hit under the eye, i.e. to tease or annoy, subdue.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
